author: BBC News
description: France's new president says it is 'the only reaction' for fighting populism.
title: France's Macron calls for 'historic reconstruction' of Europe

author: Simon Book
description: Die Krisenairline Air France ist wie ein Vorläufer für die Probleme, auf die Frankreichs neuer Präsident Emmanuel Macron mit seinem Reformkurs stoßen wird. Dort läuft schief, was auch in Frankreich schiefläuft.
title: Macrons Reformkurs: Warum Air France ein Sinnbild für Frankreichs Probleme ist

author: Sean McLain
description: The head of the Renault-Nissan Alliance said “we need to defend, explain and market globalization.” He also welcomed the recent election of Emmanuel Macron in France.
title: Carlos Ghosn: Politicians Need to Be Better at Defending Globalization

author: Boris Veldhuijzen van Zanten
description: When I was six months old my parents moved to France, and we lived there for a couple of years. When we moved back to the Netherlands, we brought the old refrigerator with us and dented ...
title: What’s hidden in the negative space?

description: Der einstige deutsche Tour-de-France-Held Jan Ullrich kehrt als Funktionär in den Profiradsport zurück und wird Sportlicher Leiter des Rheinklassikers „Rund um Köln”. Das sagten der Tour-de-France-Sieger von 1997 und Rennorganisator Artur Tabat dem „Kölner Stadt-Anzeiger”.
title: Radsport: Jan Ullrich wird Sportlicher Leiter bei „Rund um Köln”

author: Lucy Pasha-Robinson
description: France's newly-elected President Emmanuel Macron has named Édouard Philippe as Prime Minister, according to a statement from the Élysée Palace.  The 46-year-old lawmaker and mayor of Le Havre is from the conservative Les Republicains party. He had been tipped as a favourite for the role as Mr Macron attempts to gain support from both the left and right ahead of June's Parliamentary elections.
title: Emmanuel Macron has named his Prime Minister on his first day in office
